# Node.js higher-level ZooKeeper client.

Higher level Node.js ZooKeeper client based on
[node-zookeeper](https://github.com/yfinkelstein/node-zookeeper) with the
following features:

* Reconecting when a connection has been lost
* Locking
* Master election

## Development

### Running tests

`npm run-script test`

### Running lint

`npm run-script lint`
